short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add whatever gift you are looking at to any gift registry on Celebrate Me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking at a gift online? Use the CelebrateMe Gift Adder to add it to any registry that you're a part of! 

It can read the gift you're getting straight off the web page, and automatically add it to your CelebrateMe Registry, without having to manually type anything in.
